titles.title: Steel Industry National Historic Site Act
A bill to establish the Steel Industry National Historic Site in the State of Pennsylvania.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 1/9/2009--Introduced. Steel Industry National Historic Site Act - Establishes the Steel Industry National Historic Site in Pennsylvania as a unit of the National Park System. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation specified property for inclusion within such Site. Requires the Secretary to prepare and submit to specified congressional committees a general management plan for the Site.
